summary_md:
# PTD Today Daily (Homepage • last 60 hours) Intelligence Brief

## 1) Top Themes
- Deadly fire disaster at a Swiss ski resort bar on New Year's
- NYC Mayor Mamdani’s early governance actions and agenda
- Political developments involving former President Trump
- New Year celebrations coverage in the Middle East
- Justice Department-related political developments in the US

## 2) Top Stories
- A deadly fire at a Swiss ski resort bar during New Year’s party killed dozens and injured around 100 people, with an ongoing live scene reported (Sources: CNN, Reuters).
- NYC Mayor Mamdani announced his housing agenda through his first executive orders as part of a democratic socialist agenda pledge (Sources: Reuters).
- Former President Trump shared unusual comments about his health with the Wall Street Journal and has plans for a second-term influence over the Justice Department (Sources: CNN, The Wall Street Journal).
- Middle East welcomed 2026 with spectacular celebrations, marking the start of the new year in the region (Source: Reuters).
- A deposition video of Jack Smith was released, indicating ongoing US political or legal proceedings (Source: CNN).
- The Costco co-founder criticized mistreatment of people in a recent interview (Source: The Wall Street Journal).

## 3) Sector Takeaways
- **Grid / Renewables:** Not enough information in the headlines.
- **Data Centers & AI:** Not enough information in the headlines.

## 4) Notable Companies/Regions Mentioned
- Swiss ski resort (location of the deadly fire)
- New York City (NYC Mayor Mamdani’s agenda)
- Costco (co-founder’s comments)
- United States (Justice Department and political developments involving Trump)
- Middle East (New Year celebrations)
